TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Reference extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 XML 签名的 元素。

span.span: Represents the element of an XML signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象表示 <`reference`> 元素的 XML 数字签名规范所定义的 XML 数字签名。The object represents the <`reference`> element of an XML digital signature defined by the XML digital signature specification. 使用对象来指定以下信息：Use the object to specify the following information: - 用于数据对象的签名摘要算法。The digest algorithm used to sign of the data object. 此值是必需的。This value is required. - 统一资源标识符 (URI) 的数据对象进行签名。The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the data object to sign. URI 可以指定文件路径或 XML 文档内的特定元素。The URI can specify a file path or specific elements within an XML document. 此值是必需的。This value is required. - 要在生成摘要之前应用的转换链。A chain of transforms to apply before generating the digest. 此值为可选值。This value is optional. - 要签名的对象类型。The type of object to sign. 此值为可选值。This value is optional. - 用于引用当前的唯一标识符``元素。A unique identifier used to reference the current `` element. 此值为可选值。This value is optional. 有关详细信息 <`reference`> 元素，请参阅 W3C 规范在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/。For more information about the <`reference`> element, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何生成和验证封装的 XML 签名使用对象。The following code example demonstrates how to generate and verify an enveloped XML signature using the object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CPP/xmldsigenv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CS/xmldsigenv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/VB/xmldsigenv.vb#1)]

[!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CPP/xmldsigenv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CS/xmldsigenv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/VB/xmldsigenv.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何生成并验证是否已分离的 XML 签名使用对象。The following code example demonstrates how to generate and verify a detached XML signature using the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化对象对数据进行特殊处理的 URI 处`""`， `#xpointer(/)`，和`#xxxx`。This constructor initializes the object to the data at the URI with special processing for `""`, `#xpointer(/)`, and `#xxxx`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类进行签名和验证使用封装签名的 XML 文档。The following code example uses the class to sign and verify an XML document using an envelope signature. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.Signature - Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.Signature - Envelope/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.Signature - Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.Signature - Envelope/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.Signature - Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.Signature - Envelope/VB/sample.vb#1)]

param.name: transform
param.span: 要添加到转换列表的转换。

span.span: The transform to be added to the list of transforms.

summary.span: 将 对象添加到要在传递给摘要算法之前对数据执行的转换的列表中。

span.span: Adds a object to the list of transforms to be performed on the data before passing it to the digest algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法修改``元素和关联的子元素的 XML 数字签名。The method modifies the `` element and associated subelements of an XML digital signature. 在已添加的顺序应用转换。Transforms are applied in the order in which they were added. 如果没有指定任何转换，转换会自动添加所需的最低。If no transforms are specified, the minimum required transforms are added automatically. 有关 XML 数字签名的详细信息，请参阅 W3C 规范在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何生成和验证封装的 XML 签名使用对象。The following code example demonstrates how to generate and verify an enveloped XML signature using the object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CPP/xmldsigenv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CS/xmldsigenv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/VB/xmldsigenv.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何生成并验证是否已分离的 XML 签名使用对象。The following code example demonstrates how to generate and verify a detached XML signature using the object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CPP/xmldsigdetach.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CS/xmldsigdetach.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/VB/xmldsigdetach.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置当前 的摘要方法统一资源标识符 (URI)。

span.span: Gets or sets the digest method Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the current .

value.span: 当前 的摘要方法 URI。

span.span: The digest method URI of the current .
The default value is "http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#sha1".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使用一个 URI 字符串来表示 <`DigestMethod`> 元素的 XML 数字签名。The property uses a URI string to represent the <`DigestMethod`> element of an XML digital signature. 摘要方法是使用对哈希的算法。The digest method is the algorithm used to hash the . 默认的算法是。The default algorithm is . 有关 XML 数字签名的详细信息，请参阅 W3C 规范在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ DigestValue { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value); };
member this.DigestValue : byte[] with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前 的摘要值。

span.span: Gets or sets the digest value of the current .
The digest value of the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使用一个字节数组来表示 <`DigestValue`> 元素的 XML 数字签名。The property uses an array of bytes to represent the <`DigestValue`> element of an XML digital signature. 属性包含所描述的对象的摘要的 Base 64 编码值属性。The property contains the Base 64 encoded value of the digest of the object described by the property. 属性自动填充合适的值，无论何时调用。The property is automatically populated with the appropriate value whenever you make a call to . 有关 XML 数字签名的详细信息，请参阅 W3C 规范在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Cryptography::Xml::TransformChain ^ TransformChain { System::Security::Cryptography::Xml::TransformChain ^ get(); void set(System::Security::Cryptography::Xml::TransformChain ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取当前 的转换链。

span.span: Gets the transform chain of the current .
The transform chain of the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示 <`Transform`> 元素和关联的子元素的 XML 数字签名。The property represents the <`Transform`> element and associated subelements of an XML digital signature. 转换链是转换的排序的列表。The transform chain is an ordered list of transforms. 这些转换的输出构成中指定的哈希算法的输入属性。The output of these transforms constitutes the input to the hash algorithm specified in the property. 有关 XML 数字签名的详细信息，请参阅 W3C 规范在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Uri { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Uri : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前 的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the of the current .
The of the current .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性使用统一资源标识符 (URI) 的字符串来表示 <`URI`> 元素的 XML 数字签名。The property uses a string Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to represent the <`URI`> element of an XML digital signature. 使用属性来指定文档进行签名，并指定当前的 XML 文档进行签名，或以指示整个文档应进行签名的元素的位置。Use the property to specify the location of a document to sign, and to specify which element of the current XML document to sign or to indicate that the entire document should be signed. 若要成功创建 XML 数字签名，必须设置属性。To successfully create an XML digital signature, you must set the property. 下表描述了可以将传递到值属性。The following table describes the values that you can pass to the property. |要签名的对象Object to sign|传递给值属性Value passed to the property| |--------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |使用被包封的签名的整个 XML 文档。An entire XML document using an enveloped signature.|空字符串:""An empty string: ""| |使用被包封的签名的 XML 文档中的特定元素。A specific element within an XML document using an enveloped signature.|由属性名称 ID 标识的 XML 元素的名称The name of an XML element identified by an attribute name ID. 此字符串应采用以下形式其中`IDname`是有效的特性名称 ID 的名称：The string should take the following form where `IDname` is the name of a valid attribute name ID:

"#Idname""#Idname"| |使用分离的签名的文件。A file using a detached signature.|文件的 URI:"c:\data.jpg"或"c:\data.xml"。The URI of a file: "c:\data.jpg" or "c:\data.xml".| 有关 XML 数字签名的详细信息，请参阅 World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) [XML 签名语法和处理规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [XML Signature Syntax and Processing Specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何生成和验证封装的 XML 签名使用对象。The following code example demonstrates how to generate and verify an enveloped XML signature using the object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CPP/xmldsigenv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CS/xmldsigenv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/VB/xmldsigenv.vb#1)]
